php.LBL_RC_username_domain: دامنه (به طور خودکار اضافه شده برای ورود به سایت)
php.LBL_RC_smtp_user: Login to SMTP server ("%u" - login of logged in user)
php.LBL_RC_smtp_pass: Password to SMTP server ("%p" - password of logged in user)
php.LBL_RC_default_port: Port used to connect to IMAP
php.LBL_RC_ip_check: Check IP address of client while giving authorization
php.LBL_RC_auto_create_user: Automatically create new user while logging in
php.LBL_RC_mail_pagesize: Number of messages in list view
php.LBL_RC_addressbook_pagesize: Number of contacts in list view
php.LBL_RC_mdn_requests: How to behave if message demands notification of delivery
php.LBL_RC_imap_open_add_connection_type: Add type and protocol to address
php.identities_level_0: many identities with possibility of editing all parameters
php.identities_level_1: many identities with possibility of editing all parameters, but not the email address
php.identities_level_2: one identity with possibility of editing all parameters
php.identities_level_3: one identity with possibility of editing all parameters, but not the email address
php.identities_level_4: one identity with possibility of editing only signature
php.htmleditor_3: in transfering or replying to HTML message
php.mdn_requests_3: send automatically if sender is in address book, otherwise ask the user
php.mdn_requests_4: send automatically if sender is in address book, otherwise ignore
php.LBL_MAIL_NOT_FOUND_IN_DB: Mail not found in the database.
php.LBL_NUMBER_OF_FOUND_MAIL_ADDRESSES: تعداد نشانی های ایمیل یافت شده

js.NoFindEmailInRecord: Record does not have email address
